primary.title: Turmeric-Honey Anti-Acne Mask
primary.preparation: Mix turmeric and honey, add lemon drops. Apply for 15 minutes.
primary.application: Apply on clean face, avoid eye area. Rinse with lukewarm water.

alternatives.title: Neem-Tulsi Face Wash
alternatives.preparation: Boil leaves in water for 10 minutes, strain and cool.
alternatives.application: Use as face wash twice daily

alternatives.title: Multani Mitti Clay Mask
alternatives.preparation: Mix clay with rose water to form paste, add sandalwood.
alternatives.application: Apply thick layer, let dry for 20 minutes, rinse gently.

alternatives.title: Fenugreek Seed Paste
alternatives.preparation: Soak seeds overnight, grind to paste in morning.
alternatives.application: Apply paste for 20 minutes, rinse with cold water.

primary.title: Aloe Vera Cooling Treatment
primary.preparation: Extract fresh aloe gel, mix with turmeric. Soak cloth in cold milk.
primary.application: Apply aloe mixture, then cold milk compress for 10 minutes.

alternatives.title: Coconut Oil-Camphor Balm
alternatives.preparation: Warm coconut oil slightly, dissolve camphor, add honey.
alternatives.application: Apply gently on cooled burn area, cover with clean cloth.

alternatives.title: Potato Slice Remedy
alternatives.preparation: Cut potato into thick slices, chill in cold water.
alternatives.application: Place cold potato slices on burn for 15 minutes.

alternatives.title: Cucumber-Mint Cooling Paste
alternatives.preparation: Blend cucumber and mint, mix with yogurt.
alternatives.application: Apply thick layer, leave for 30 minutes.

primary.title: Sandalwood-Rose Water Paste
primary.preparation: Mix sandalwood with rose water to form smooth paste, add oil.
primary.application: Apply gently on affected area, let dry naturally.

alternatives.title: Oatmeal Soothing Bath
alternatives.preparation: Grind oatmeal to fine powder, mix with honey.
alternatives.application: Add to warm bath water, soak for 20 minutes.

alternatives.title: Calendula-Chamomile Compress
alternatives.preparation: Steep herbs in hot water for 15 minutes, strain.
alternatives.application: Soak clean cloth in tea, apply as warm compress.

alternatives.title: Baking Soda Paste
alternatives.preparation: Mix baking soda with water to form paste, add oil.
alternatives.application: Apply for 10 minutes, rinse with cool water.

primary.title: Lemon-Honey Brightening Mask
primary.preparation: Mix all ingredients until well combined.
primary.application: Apply on spots, leave for 20 minutes, rinse with lukewarm water.
primary.ancient_origin: Traditional Middle Eastern and Indian beauty practices

alternatives.title: Papaya-Pineapple Enzyme Mask
alternatives.preparation: Mash papaya, mix with pineapple juice and honey.
alternatives.application: Apply for 15 minutes, massage gently before rinsing.

alternatives.title: Tomato-Yogurt Bleaching Pack
alternatives.preparation: Blend tomato, mix with yogurt and gram flour.
alternatives.application: Apply thick layer, let dry for 25 minutes.

alternatives.title: Potato-Cucumber Lightening Juice
alternatives.preparation: Extract juice from potato and cucumber, add lemon.
alternatives.application: Apply with cotton pad, leave overnight.

primary.title: Coconut Oil-Milk Cream Moisturizer
primary.preparation: Warm coconut oil slightly, mix with cream and honey.
primary.application: Massage gently into skin before bedtime.
primary.ancient_origin: Traditional Ayurvedic skincare from Kerala, India

alternatives.title: Avocado-Olive Oil Mask
alternatives.preparation: Mash avocado, mix with oil and yogurt until smooth.
alternatives.application: Apply thick layer, leave for 30 minutes.

alternatives.title: Banana-Honey Hydrating Pack
alternatives.preparation: Mash banana thoroughly, mix with honey and milk.
alternatives.application: Apply for 20 minutes, rinse with lukewarm water.

alternatives.title: Almond Oil-Rose Water Toner
alternatives.preparation: Mix all ingredients in a small bottle, shake well.
alternatives.application: Apply with cotton pad after cleansing.

primary.title: Anti-Aging Saffron-Milk Mask
primary.preparation: Soak saffron in warm milk for 10 minutes, add honey and oil.
primary.application: Apply with gentle upward strokes, leave for 25 minutes.
primary.ancient_origin: Persian and Indian royal beauty treatments

alternatives.title: Egg White-Lemon Tightening Mask
alternatives.preparation: Whisk egg white until frothy, add lemon and honey.
alternatives.application: Apply thin layer, let dry completely, rinse gently.

alternatives.title: Grape-Yogurt Antioxidant Pack
alternatives.preparation: Crush grapes, mix with yogurt and vitamin E oil.
alternatives.application: Apply for 20 minutes, massage gently before rinsing.

primary.title: Tea Tree-Neem Spot Treatment
primary.preparation: Mix oils with aloe gel until well combined.
primary.application: Apply directly on pimples with cotton swab.
primary.ancient_origin: Australian Aboriginal and Indian traditional medicine

alternatives.title: Garlic-Honey Antibacterial Paste
alternatives.preparation: Crush garlic, mix with honey and turmeric.
alternatives.application: Apply on pimple for 10 minutes, rinse thoroughly.

alternatives.title: Ice-Green Tea Compress
alternatives.preparation: Brew strong green tea, freeze in ice tray.
alternatives.application: Wrap ice in cloth, apply on pimple for 5 minutes.

primary.title: Activated Charcoal Peel-Off Mask
primary.preparation: Dissolve gelatin in hot water, add charcoal powder.
primary.application: Apply thin layer, let dry for 15 minutes, peel off gently.
primary.ancient_origin: Traditional detoxification practices from various cultures

alternatives.title: Baking Soda-Honey Scrub
alternatives.preparation: Mix baking soda with honey, add water to form paste.
alternatives.application: Gently scrub in circular motions, rinse with warm water.

alternatives.title: Oatmeal-Lemon Exfoliating Mask
alternatives.preparation: Mix all ingredients to form thick paste.
alternatives.application: Apply and scrub gently, leave for 10 minutes.

primary.title: Coconut Oil-Turmeric Healing Balm
primary.preparation: Melt coconut oil, mix with turmeric and honey, add lavender oil.
primary.application: Apply gently on affected areas, leave overnight.
primary.ancient_origin: Traditional Pacific Islander and Ayurvedic treatments

alternatives.title: Aloe-Chamomile Soothing Gel
alternatives.preparation: Brew strong chamomile tea, cool, mix with aloe and vitamin E.
alternatives.application: Apply multiple times daily on irritated skin.

alternatives.title: Oatmeal-Milk Bath Soak
alternatives.preparation: Grind oatmeal finely, mix with milk powder and honey.
alternatives.application: Add to warm bath, soak for 20 minutes.

primary.title: Dead Sea Salt-Olive Oil Treatment
primary.preparation: Mix salt with olive oil and honey to form scrub.
primary.application: Gently massage on affected areas, leave for 15 minutes.

alternatives.title: Turmeric-Neem Oil Paste
alternatives.preparation: Mix turmeric with oils to form smooth paste.
alternatives.application: Apply on patches, cover with cloth, leave for 30 minutes.

alternatives.title: Aloe-Apple Cider Vinegar Toner
alternatives.preparation: Mix all ingredients until well combined.
alternatives.application: Apply with cotton pad, let air dry.

primary.title: Cucumber-Yogurt Cooling Mask
primary.preparation: Blend cucumber, mix with yogurt, aloe, and honey.
primary.application: Apply thick layer on sunburned areas, leave for 30 minutes.
primary.ancient_origin: Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cooling treatments

alternatives.title: Cold Milk-Honey Compress
alternatives.preparation: Mix cold milk with honey.
alternatives.application: Soak cloth in mixture, apply as compress for 20 minutes.

alternatives.title: Green Tea-Mint Ice Cubes
alternatives.preparation: Brew strong tea with mint, freeze in ice cube trays.
alternatives.application: Wrap ice cubes in cloth, apply on sunburn.

primary.title: Turmeric-Honey Antiseptic Paste
primary.preparation: Mix turmeric with honey, add coconut oil for consistency.
primary.application: Clean wound, apply paste, cover with clean bandage.

alternatives.title: Aloe-Calendula Healing Gel
alternatives.preparation: Mix aloe with calendula and tea tree oil.
alternatives.application: Apply thin layer on clean cut, cover if needed.

alternatives.title: Plantain Leaf Poultice
alternatives.preparation: Crush fresh plantain leaves to release juices.
alternatives.application: Place crushed leaves on cut, secure with cloth.

primary.title: Arnica-Comfrey Cold Compress
primary.preparation: Mix oils, apply to cloth, place over ice pack.
primary.application: Apply cold compress for 15 minutes, 3 times daily.

alternatives.title: Pineapple-Ginger Anti-inflammatory Paste
alternatives.preparation: Mash pineapple, extract ginger juice, mix with honey.
alternatives.application: Apply on bruise, cover with cloth for 20 minutes.

alternatives.title: Cabbage Leaf Wrap
alternatives.preparation: Blanch cabbage leaves in warm water until soft.
alternatives.application: Place warm leaves on bruise, secure with bandage.

primary.title: Epsom Salt-Lavender Soak
primary.preparation: Dissolve Epsom salt in warm water, add lavender oil.
primary.application: Soak affected area for 20 minutes, twice daily.

alternatives.title: Ginger-Turmeric Anti-inflammatory Paste
alternatives.preparation: Mix ginger paste with turmeric and coconut oil.
alternatives.application: Apply thick layer, wrap with cloth, leave for 30 minutes.

alternatives.title: Cold-Hot Alternating Therapy
alternatives.preparation: Prepare ice pack and hot water bottle.
alternatives.application: Apply cold for 10 minutes, then hot for 10 minutes.

primary.title: Rosehip-Vitamin E Scar Oil
primary.preparation: Mix all oils in a small dark bottle.
primary.application: Massage gently into scar tissue twice daily.
primary.frequency: Daily for 3-6 months for best results

alternatives.title: Onion-Honey Scar Reduction Paste
alternatives.preparation: Extract onion juice, mix with honey and lemon.
alternatives.application: Apply on scar, leave for 15 minutes, rinse gently.

alternatives.title: Aloe-Cocoa Butter Healing Balm
alternatives.preparation: Melt cocoa butter, mix with aloe and coconut oil.
alternatives.application: Apply and massage gently into scar tissue.

primary.title: Baking Soda-Oatmeal Soothing Paste
primary.preparation: Mix baking soda and oatmeal, add water to form paste, mix in honey.
primary.application: Apply on bite, leave for 15 minutes, rinse with cool water.
primary.frequency: Apply as needed for itching relief

alternatives.title: Peppermint-Tea Tree Cooling Gel
alternatives.preparation: Mix aloe gel with essential oils.
alternatives.application: Apply small amount on bite for instant cooling relief.

alternatives.title: Apple Cider Vinegar-Lavender Spray
alternatives.preparation: Mix ingredients in spray bottle, shake well.
alternatives.application: Spray on affected area, let air dry.
